completions.nl_description: Move all objects of color R toward the object of color Y, if they are neighbors of it.
completions.code: (do (rule (vars (this other)) (filter (and (color_equals (color_of this) R) (and (neighbor_of this other) (color_equals (color_of other) Y)))) (apply (move_node_max (direction_of other)))))

completions.nl_description: Change the objects consisting of 4 cells from G to R.
Detect all objects that are neighbors with objects of color R, and then move the R colored objects maximally towards them.
Rotate half of the objects by 270 degrees
Move all objects of size 4 towards all the objects of color Y
Move all objects of color R, toward the nearest object of color C, only if they are neighbors of each other.
Move all objects of color R and size greater than or equal to 4 towards the object of color C, and then recolor them to C.
Move all the vertical object columns of color R one step to the right.
Move all objects of color R towards the nearest object of color Y, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects to the object of color R if they are neighbors.
Extend all red objects towards the nearest green object, without overlapping.
Move all objects of size 4 towards the object of color R if they are neighbors.
Move all objects of color R one step to the right if they are neighboring objects of color Y.
Recolor all objects to color Y if they are neighbors to an object of color R.
Change the color of all objects that are neighbors of an object of color R, to the color of R.
Move all objects of color R one step up, except in the bottom row where they should not move.
Move all the objects of size 4 towards the nearest object of color C.
Move all objects of size 4 one step toward the nearest neighbor of the same color, then recolor all objects of color C in the grid to color Y.
Move all red objects to the positions of cyan objects if they are neighbors and recolor them to cyan.
Recolor all objects touching the edge of the grid to color Y and then color C.
Move all the objects of color R towards objects of color Y if they are neighbors.
Extend all objects of color R toward the nearest neighbor with color not equal to R, without overlapping.
Recolor all objects to color C, if they have a neighbor of color C.
Move all objects of color R towards the object of color Y, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all R objects as close to C and then recolor them to C
Move all red objects one step up.
Change all objects' colors where the color equals R to color Y.
Recolor to Y all objects next to any R object (including connected R objects).
Move all red objects towards the yellow objects
Extend objects of red color until they hit another object, towards the direction of the closest red object.
Recolor the middle object in each grid column to color Y.
Recolor all objects of color R to Y
Move all objects of color R toward the nearest object of color C, if they are neighbors of it.
Move the objects with maximum height towards objects of color Y or R, if they are neighbors.
Recolor regions of height 2 that are neighbors of the maximum height region to color R.
Maintain all objects' current properties. Move every object of color R one step right.
Move the objects of color R that are of size 4 or greater, one step up.
Recolor all objects of color G to color Y, but only if they are neighbors of an object of color C.
Move all objects of color R, if they are neighbors of an object of color Y, towards the object of color Y
Move all objects of color R downwards if neighbors are different color than R.
Move all objects of color R toward the nearest neighbor of color different from R.

Move all objects of color R vertically upward until the top of the grid while preserving the relative positions of its internal pairs of R objects, that is above object R moves above while below one will move below
Move all objects of color G towards maximum size object of color R until they touch.
Move all objects of color R to the maximum extent towards the object of color Y, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color R one step to the right if they are neighbors of any object of size greater than 1.
Move all objects of color R toward the object of color Y, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color R toward the object of color C, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color other than R towards the nearest R, until they become neighbors.
Recolor part of objects that overlap the subgrid of objects colored 'C' to the color 'R'.
Move all objects of size 4 toward the nearest object with the color C.
Extend the red objects in the grid vertically upwards without overlapping
Move all objects of color different than Y, toward the object of color Y, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color R one step up, that are neighbors of objects of color C.
Recolor all objects of color Y to C
Recolor objects of color R (red) that have no neighbors of any other color than R or O to color Y (yellow).
Recolor the neighbors of any object with color R to have the color R.
Move all objects of color 'R' towards the object of color 'Y' if they are neighbors of 'Y', and then recolor them to color 'Y'.
Move all objects of color R toward an object of color R in each row for pairs 1 and 2, and same action but extending the color change in pair 3.
Move all objects of size 4 towards the objects of color Y if they are neighbors, and recolor them to color Y.
Move all objects of color R towards objects of color Y, if they are neighbors of them.
Move all objects of color R toward the object of color Y, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color R to the nearest adjacent non-R cell, then recolor them with color Y.
Move all objects of color R, that are neighbors of objects of color Y, towards them.
Recolor all objects that are adjacent to at least two other objects of different colors to color R.
Move objects of color B to the nearest R object when they are neighbors, and maximize their movement.
Change the color of the entire object containing the color Y to that of Y.
Move all objects containing R to move towards the object Y if they are neighbors.
Recolor all objects of color R to color Y.
Move objects of size 2 to the right if they are neighbors with an object of size 4.
Recolor the border of all objects present in the input grid to color Y.
Color all objects of color R to color Y if it has a neighbor of color G
Move all objects of color different than Y, toward the object of color Y, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all object segments of size 1 to the nearest object of color R.

Color all the region segments consisting of the color R in C if their size is greater than 4.
Move all objects of color R one step to the top.
Move all objects of color R one step up, then recolor the intersection of any row of color R and color Y with color Y.
Recolor the object where color O appears, in pairs 2 and 3, to color Y.
Recolor all objects with the color Y to X, and then recolor the objects of shape enclosed.
Move all objects of color R in the direction of the Y-colored objects, and then recolor R objects to Y.
Recolor all objects of size 4 to C.
Recolor all objects with a neighboring 'Y' to 'Y'.
Recolor all objects intersecting with the objects of color R to color R.

completions.code: (do (rule (vars (this other)) (filter (and (color_equals (color_of this) R) (and (neighbor_of this other) (color_equals (color_of other) G)))) (apply (move_node_max (direction_of other)))))

completions.nl_description: Move all objects of color R toward the nearest neighboring object of any color but R until it reaches the edge or another object.
Move objects of color R to the highest part of the grid where there is an open space on their column.
Move objects with color R to the center column if they are adjacent to an object with color R in the center column.
Recolor the minimum sized objects of color R to C.
Extend all the objects of color R toward the object to their right, without overlapping.
Recolor the object of color R that is the closest to color X to yellow.
If an object is a neighbor of an object with color Y, extend the object in all directions around it to form a square with size 5, overlapping.
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this other))
        (filter
            (and
                (neighbor_of this other)
                (color_equals (color_of other) Y)
            )
        )
        (apply
            (extend_node left true)
            (extend_node right true)
            (extend_node up true)
            (extend_node down true)
        )
    )
)

completions.nl_description: Move all red (R) objects one step up to avoid overlapping and recolor the spaces it previously occupied to yellow (Y).
